trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> uses its own journal.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref> utilizza il proprio journal.

trans-unit.source: JournalOwnership is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership*> property.

When JournalOwnership is Automatic, the following behavior applies: - The hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> behaves as though UsesParentJournal was set if it is hosted by either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> or a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: Quando JournalOwnership sia impostato su automatico, si applica il comportamento seguente: - l'ospitata <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>si comporta come se UsesParentJournal è stata impostata se è ospitato da un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>o un <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: - The hosted <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> behaves as though OwnsJournal was set if: - It is not directly hosted by either a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> or <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: -Ospitato <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>si comporta come se OwnsJournal è stato impostato:-non è ospitato direttamente da una <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>o <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: - It is hosted by at least one <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, where each containing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property is set to UsesParentJournal.
trans-unit.target: -È ospitato da almeno uno <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, dove ognuno dei quali contiene <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>è relativo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>proprietà è impostata su UsesParentJournal.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > once a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> creates its own journal, switching to Automatic has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > dopo un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>Crea il proprio journal, passaggio automatico non ha alcun effetto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Whether or not this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> will create and use its own journal depends on its parent.
trans-unit.target: Se questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref> verranno creare e usare il proprio journal dipende dal relativo elemento padre.
Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref> mantiene il proprio journal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref> uses the journal of the next available navigation host up the content tree, if available.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref> utilizza il journal dell'host di navigazione disponibili successivo alla struttura ad albero del contenuto, se disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, navigation history is not maintained for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, cronologia di navigazione non viene mantenuta per la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Frame"> </xref>.
